news_header: France hosts a security meeting on Ukraine and European security.
news_original_title: Ranska järjestää tänään uuden turvallisuus­kokouksen – Stubb ja Orpo osallistuvat etänä
news_text: France is holding a security meeting in Paris to discuss Ukraine and European security, with participation from several countries including Finland, Sweden, and Norway. The meeting emphasizes the importance of supporting Ukraine and maintaining a united European voice amidst recent geopolitical tensions.
